channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17720] Bitvectors are not shown in describe statement on beeline
item.description: Describe statement takes different codepath for HS2 where bit vectors weren't displayed.
item.summary: Bitvectors are not shown in describe statement on beeline

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This patch additionally fixes headers for desc statement, where comment & bitvector was flipped in header.
kgyrtkirk Can you please review?

#2)

since HIVE-17519 is in I've rebased the patch.
in that change I've simplified to use only one path; but that also missed these bitvector printouts
now that I see how it looks like in beeline; we might want to rethink what HIVE-17519 aimed to do...
